titleStmt.title: The friers lamenting, for his not repenting. Being a relation of the life and death of Francis Colewort a frier, who related a little before his death a threefold plot of treason. With his conversion to the Protestant religion, at Hungerford in Barkshire.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Title page has printers' device (McK. imperfect: 268-272).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
